scripts.dev: concurrently -n "BACKEND,FRONTEND" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "npm --prefix backend run dev" "npm --prefix frontend run dev"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n "BACKEND,FRONTEND" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "npm --prefix backend run dev" "npm --prefix frontend run dev"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm --prefix backend install && npm --prefix frontend install
